properties.verseOrder: v1 p1 c1 v2 p1 c1 b1 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
G
Seated above enthroned
in the Father's love
Destined to die
poured out for all mankind
God's only Son
perfect and spotless One
He never sinned
but suffered as if He did

verse.name: p1
verse.lines:
All authority
Every victory is Yours
All authority
Every victory is Yours

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Savior worthy of honor
and glory
Worthy of all our praise
For You overcame
Jesus awesome in
power forever
Awesome and great
is Your Name
For You overcame

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Power in hand
speaking the Father's plan
You're sending us out
light in this broken land

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
We will overcome
By the blood of the Lamb
And the word of our testimony
Everyone overcome
(Repeat)
